WSUS33 KKCI 271955 
SIGW  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 3W 
VALID UNTIL 2155Z 
MT ID WA 
FROM 40SSW YXC-30ENE MLP-50SSE GEG-30W GEG-80WSW YXC-40SSW YXC 
AREA TS MOV FROM 25040KT. TOPS TO FL310. 
 
OUTLOOK VALID 272155-280155 
FROM 80WSW YXC-50SSE YQL-HLN-60NE BOI-BKE-80WSW YXC 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==

WSUS32 KKCI 271955 
SIGC  
CONVECTIVE SIGMET 33C 
VALID UNTIL 2155Z 
TX 
FROM 50ESE FST-20NNE MRF 
LINE TS 25 NM WIDE MOV FROM 27020KT. TOPS ABV FL450.

AREA 1...FROM 40SW MCI-40ESE STL-MEM-50WSW TUL-40SW MCI 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 2...FROM 40WNW GRB-30NW MBS-GIJ-40WNW DBQ-40WNW GRB 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS. 
 
AREA 3...FROM 50SE CDS-50NW ACT-40SSE DLF-40NW DLF-80ESE MRF-80SE 
MRF-MRF-40SW INK-50SE CDS 
WST ISSUANCES POSS. REFER TO MOST RECENT ACUS01 KWNS FROM STORM 
PREDICTION CENTER FOR SYNOPSIS AND METEOROLOGICAL DETAILS.
==
